channel.title: Last Chopper Out
channel.description: Curated Tiktoks and other videos of people speaking knowledgeably on a subject with brief vignettes.
channel.itunes:author: @lastchopperout on instagram

item.title: Aesthetics vs Taste, The Internet is the Etheric Plane Materialized, Do you like things to fit in?
item.description: An anthology of tiktok creators making talking head videos with original opinions on various topics about culture, tech, lifestyle, etc. It's purpose is to have a ad free and slop free listening experience. I also watched the color of Pomegranates this week so there's two short pieces on that as well.

item.title: Capitalizing on community, 1870’s reply guys, Evolution of the word “slop”
item.description: An anthology of Tiktok creators making talking head videos with original opinions on various topics about culture, tech, lifestyle, etc. Its purpose is to have a ad free and slop free listening experience.

item.title: The Geese megahype needs to end, the Anti-ChatGPT accent, Hypercontemporary over timeless literary fiction
item.description: An anthology of Tiktok thinkpieces with original opinions on culture, tech lifestyle, etc. Its purpose is to have an ad free and slop free listening experience.

item.title: The 2020's are a new middle ages, Apple will start showing ads on your phone, A sliver of hope online
item.description: Some Katseye discourse in here as well

item.title: Private equity killed youth sports, Chinatown price paradox, Substack and the pseudo-intellectual.
item.description: Other topics: I Love LA, Jaron Lanier, for-profit Gen Z community events.
